src: 'Inmiddels hebben we muizen van 4 maanden oud die geen diabetes hebben, maar dat eerder wel hebben,' voegde hij er nog aan toe.
mt: 'Now we have mice that are four months old and don't have diabetes, but did earlier,' he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Professor Ehud Ur in de geneeskunde aan Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, tevens voorzitter van de klinische en wetenschappelijke divisie van de Canadian Diabetes Association, herinnerde eraan dat ze nog maar net zijn begonnen met het onderzoek.
mt: Professor Ehud Ur in medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, reminded that they have just begun the research.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Net als sommige andere deskundigen, is hij sceptisch over de vraag of zijn diabetes kan worden genezen, waarbij hij opmerkt dat deze bevindingen geen waarde hebben voor mensen die al type 1-diabetes hebben.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether his diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no value for people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Op maandag kondigde Sara Danius, de permanente secretaris van de nobelcommissie voor literatuur bij de Zweedse Academie, tijdens een radioprogramma op Sveriges Radio in Zweden aan dat de commissie Bob Dylan niet direct kon bereiken om hem te vertellen dat hij de Nobelprijs voor literatuur van 2016 had gewonnen en geen moeite meer zou doen om hem te bereiken.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee was unable to reach Bob Dylan directly to inform him that he had won the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature and would not be making any further attempts to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius verklaarde, 'We doen momenteel niks. Ik heb met zijn naaste medewerker gebeld en gemailed en vriendelijke antwoorden gekregen. Op dit moment is dat genoeg.'
mt: Danius said, "We're doing nothing right now. I've called and emailed his closest associate and got friendly responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Eerder merkte Jamie Siminoff, de CEO van Ring, op dat het bedrijf is opgericht toen zijn deurbel van de winkel niet hoorbaar was in zijn garage.
mt: Earlier, Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, noted that the company was founded when his doorbell was inaudible in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Hij zei dat hij daarop een wifi-deurbel maakte.
mt: He said he then made a WiFi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff zei dat de verkoop steeg nadat hij in 2013 in een aflevering van Shark Tank verscheen, waarbij het panel van het programma de start-up niet wilde financieren.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on Shark Tank in 2013, where the panel of the show refused to finance the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Eind 2017 was Siminoff te zien op teleshoppingkanaal QVC.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on teleshopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring trof ook een schikking in een rechtszaak met de ADT Corporation. Dat is een concurrerend beveiligingsbedrijf.
mt: Ring also reached a settlement in a lawsuit with the ADT Corporation, a competing security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Eén experimenteel vaccin lijkt in staat te zijn de ebola-sterfte terug te dringen, maar tot nu toe zijn nog geen medicijnen duidelijk geschikt voor de behandeling van bestaande infecties.
mt: 1 experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce ebola mortality, but no drugs have yet been clearly suitable for the treatment of existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Een cocktail van antilichamen, ZMapp, was aanvankelijk veelbelovend in het veld. Officiële onderzoeken toonden echter aan dat het minder voordelen had dan gewenst bij het voorkomen dat mensen overlijden.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was initially promising in the field. Official studies however showed that it had less benefits than desired in preventing people from dying.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ZMapp was een controle in de PALM-proef, dus gebruikten wetenschappers het als baseline en vergeleken de drie andere behandelmethoden hiermee.
mt: ZMapp was a control in the PALM trial, so scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatment methods to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Het Amerikaanse Olympisch Comité heeft de steun van USA Gymnastics en begrijpt dat het noodzakelijk is dat de olympische familie een veilige plek promoot voor alle sporters.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has the support of USA Gymnastics and understands that it is necessary for the Olympic family to promote a safe place for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Wij sluiten ons aan bij de verklaring van het USOC dat het het beste is voor onze atleten en clubs, en hun sport, om zinvolle veranderingen door te voeren in onze organisatie in plaats van certificeringen af te nemen.
mt: We join the USOC in its statement that it is in the best interest of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, to make meaningful changes in our organization rather than take certifications away.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics steunt een onafhankelijk onderzoek dat meer duidelijkheid kan geven over hoe misbruik op deze schaal, dat zo moedig door de slachtoffers van Larry Nassar is beschreven, zo lang onopgemerkt kon blijven, en omarmt alle nodige en toepasselijke veranderingen.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that can provide more clarity on how abuse on this scale, as described so courageously by the victims of Larry Nassar, could have gone unnoticed for so long, and embraces all necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics en de USOC hebben hetzelfde doel: zorgen dat atleten hun dromen in een veilige, positieve en krachtige omgeving kunnen najagen door de sport turnen en andere sporten zo veilig mogelijk maken.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal: to ensure that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and powerful environment by making the sport of gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Gedurende de jaren 60 werkte Brzezinksi als adviseur voor John F. Kennedy en daarna voor de regering van Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Hij adviseerde tijdens de selecties van 1976 Carter op het gebied van buitenlands beleid. Vervolgens volgde hij Henry Kissinger op als National Security Advisor (NSA); deze functie vervulde hij van 1977 tot 1981.
mt: He advised Carter during the 1976 presidential campaign on foreign policy. He then succeeded Henry Kissinger as National Security Advisor (NSA), serving from 1977 to 1981.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Als NSA stond hij Carter bij in de diplomatieke afhandeling van wereldwijde kwesties, zoals de Camp David-akkoorden in 1978, het stabiliseren van de relatie tussen de VS en China aan het eind van de jaren '70 en de Iraanse Revolutie, de daarop volgende gijzelaarscrisis en de invasie van Afghanistan door de Sovjet-Unie in 1979.
mt: As NSA he advised Carter on the diplomatic handling of world issues, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978, stabilizing relations between the US and China at the end of the 1970s, the Iranian Revolution, the hostage crisis that followed and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: De film met Ryan Gosling en Emma Stone in de hoofdrollen werd voor alle belangrijke categorieën genomineerd.
mt: La La Land  was nominated for all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling en Stone werden respectievelijk genomineerd voor Beste acteur en Beste actrice.
mt: Gosling and Stone were respectively nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Onder de overige nominaties bevonden zich onder meer de categorieën beste film, regisseur, cinematografie, kostuumontwerp, filmmontage, originele muziek, productieontwerp, muziek, geluidseffecten en origineel scenario.
mt: Among the other nominations were the categories of best film, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original music score, production design, music, sound effects and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: De nummers Audition (The Fools Who Dream) en City of Stars uit de film werden genomineerd voor Beste originele nummer. Lionsgate haalde 26 nominaties binnen, een record voor een studio.
mt: The numbers Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars from the film were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, a record for a studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: In een verklaring van zijn perssecretaris liet de Amerikaanse president Donald Trump zondagavond weten dat de Amerikaanse troepen zich uit Syrië zouden terugtrekken.
mt: In a statement from his press secretary, U.S. President Donald Trump announced Sunday evening that U.S. troops would be withdrawing from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: De aankondiging kwam na een telefonisch overleg tussen Trump en de Turkse president Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Ook gaven de Turken volgens het communiqué aan dat zij de gevangen strijders van ISIS zouden gaan bewaken, waarvan Europa ze niet terug wilde nemen.
mt: The Turks also said in the statement that they would be monitoring the captured ISIS fighters, whom Europe did not want to take back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Dit bewijst niet alleen de al wijdverspreide theorie dat in elk geval bepaalde dinosauriërs veren hadden, maar biedt ook meer details dan fossielen, zoals de kleur en driedimensionale plaatsing.
mt: This not only proves the widely held theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides more details than fossils, such as color and three-dimensional placement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Volgens wetenschappers was het verenkleed van dit dier kastanjebruin met een bleke of carotenoïdekleurige onderzijde.
mt: According to scientists, the feathered coat of this bird was chestnut brown with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: De vondst geeft ook inzicht in de evolutie van veren bij vogels.
mt: The discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: De onderzoekers trokken de conclusie dat de rachis waarschijnlijk een latere evolutionaire ontwikkeling was, doordat dinosaurusveren geen goed ontwikkelde schacht, oftewel een rachis, hebben, maar wel over andere kenmerken van veren beschikken - zoals weerhaken.
mt: The researchers concluded that the tail vertebrae were probably a later evolutionary development, because dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed shaft, or rachis, but did have other features of feathers, such as barbs.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: De structuur van de veren lijkt erop te wijzen dat deze niet gebruikt werden om te vliegen, maar om de temperatuur te regelen of om hoe het eruit zag. De onderzoekers suggereerden dat dit de staart van een jonge dinosaurus is, maar dat dit monster juist volwassen veren laat zien en dus niet het dons van een kuiken.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or appearance. The researchers suggested this was the tail of a young dinosaur, but this monster shows fully mature feathers and thus not the down of a chick.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: De onderzoekers suggereerden dat, ondanks dat het om de staart van een jonge dinosaurus gaat, het monster het verenkleed van een volwassene had en niet het dons van een kuiken.
mt: The researchers suggested that, despite the fact that it was the tail of a young dinosaur, the monster had the adult plumage, not the down of a chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Gistermorgen ontplofte een autobom bij het hoofdbureau van de politie in Gaziantep, Turkije. Hierbij kwamen twee politieagenten om het leven en raakten meer dan twintig andere personen gewond.
mt: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey. Two police officers were killed and more than twenty others were injured.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Onder de gewonden zijn negentien politieagenten, zei de gouverneur.
mt: 19 police officers were injured, the governor said.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: De politie verdenkt een vermeende Daesh-militair (ISIS) van de aanval.
mt: Police suspect a suspected Daesh military (ISIS) of the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Hieruit bleek dat de zon dezelfde basisprincipes als andere sterren volgt: alle sterrenactiviteit in het stelsel is uitsluitend gebaseerd de helderheid en rotatie van de sterren.
mt: It was found that the sun follows the same basic principles as other stars: all stellar activity in the system is based solely on the brightness and rotation of the stars.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: De helderheid en rotatie worden gebruikt om het getal van Rossby van een ster te bepalen. Dit is verwant aan de plasmastroming.
mt: The brightness and rotation are used to determine the Rossby number of a star. This is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Hoe kleiner het aantal Rossby-golven, hoe minder actief de ster is als het gaat om magnetische omkeringen.
mt: The fewer Rossby waves, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki raakte tijdens zijn tocht op verschillende momenten in de problemen.
mt: Iwasaki encountered problems at various times during his journey.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Piraten beroofden hem, een hondsdolle hond viel hem aan in Tibet, hij ontsnapte in Nepal aan het huwelijk en werd in India gearresteerd.
mt: Pirates robbed him, a rabid dog attacked him in Tibet, he escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: De 802.11n-norm is compatibel met beide frequenties: 2,4 Ghz en 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n is compatible with both frequencies: 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Mits het basisstation over dubbele radio's beschikt, maakt dit achterwaartse compatibiliteit met 802.11a, 802.11b en 802.11g mogelijk.
mt: 802.11n is backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g if the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Snelheden van 802.11n zijn substantieel sneller dan die van voorlopers met een maximale theoretische capaciteit van 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are substantially faster than those of predecessors with a maximum theoretical capacity of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall is getrouwd met twee kinderen en maakte geen grote indruk op Miller, aan wie het verhaal verwant was.
mt: Duvall was married with two children and made little impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Op een verzoek om commentaar reageerde Millar: 'Mike praat veel tijdens de zitting ... Ik was me aan het voorbereiden, dus luisterde niet echt naar hem.'
mt: In response to a request for comment, Millar said, "Mike talks a lot in court... I was preparing myself, so wasn't really listening to him."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: 'We doen ons uiterste best de koolstofdioxide-uitstoot per eenheid van het BBP in 2020 met een aanzienlijke marge te verminderen in vergelijking met het niveau van 2005,' zei Hu.
mt: 'We are doing our best to reduce the carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP in 2020 by a significant margin compared to the 2005 level,' Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Hij heeft voor de bezuinigingen geen cijfers vastgesteld, omdat hij zegt dat deze zullen worden bepaald op basis van de economische productie van China.
mt: He has not set any figures for the cuts, because he says they will be determined on the basis of China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu spoorde ontwikkelingslanden aan 'de oude manier van eerst vervuilen en later opruimen te vermijden'.
mt: Hu urged developing countries to avoid the old way of first polluting and then cleaning up.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Hij voegde toe dat 'ze daarentegen niet gevraagd zouden moeten worden om verplichtingen aan te gaan die buiten hun ontwikkeling, niveau, verantwoordelijkheid en mogelijkheden liggen.'
mt: He added that "they should not be asked to undertake commitments that are beyond their development, level, responsibility and possibilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: De Irakese studiegroep presenteerde hun rapport vandaag om 12.00 uur GMT.
mt: The Iraqi study group presented their report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: De waarschuwing is dat niemand kan garanderen dat geen enkele handelswijze in Irak op dit moment een einde zal maken aan sektarische oorlogsvoering, toenemend geweld of de neiging naar chaos.
mt: The warning is that no trading strategy in Iraq at this time can guarantee an end to sectarian warfare, increasing violence or the tendency toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: In het begin van het rapport staat een pleidooi voor een open discussie en voor consensusvorming in de VS over het beleid met betrekking tot het Midden-Oosten.
mt: In the beginning of the report is a plea for an open discussion and consensus formation in the US about the policy regarding the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: In het rapport wordt sterke kritiek geuit op vrijwel elk onderdeel van het huidige bestuursbeleid jegens Irak en raadt dringend een andere koers aan.
mt: The report criticizes nearly every aspect of the current administration's policy towards Iraq and urges a new course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Het rapport bevat 78 aanbevelingen, waarvan de eerste is dat dit jaar nog diplomatieke actie moet worden ondernomen om de Iraakse grenzen te beschermen tegen vijandelijke machten en de diplomatieke verstandhoudingen met omliggende landen te herstellen.
mt: 78 recommendations are contained in the report, the first of which is that diplomatic action should be taken this year to protect Iraq's borders against hostile forces and to restore diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, senator en de vrouw van de Argentijnse president, heeft gisteravond in La Plata, een stad op 50 km (31 mijl) afstand van Buenos Aires, aangekondigd zich verkiesbaar te willen stellen als president.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, senator and wife of the Argentine president, announced last night in La Plata, a city 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, that she intends to run for president.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mevrouw Kirchner kondigde haar intentie om voor het presidentschap te gaan aan in het Argentijnse Theater, waar ze in 2005 haar campagne voor de senaat startte als lid van de deelstaatafvaardiging van Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentinian Theater, where she started her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Het debat ontstond door een discussie over het investeren en opnieuw opbouwen na de orkaan Katrina. Enkele fiscale conservatieven noemden dit gekscherend 'De New Orleans Deal van Bush.'
mt: The debate was sparked by a discussion over investing and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina. Some fiscal conservatives jokingly called it "The New Orleans Deal of Bush."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberale kritiek op de reconstructiewerkzaamheden is gericht op het toekennen van reconstructiecontracten aan vermeende insiders uit Washington.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction work is focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to alleged insiders from Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: De begrafenis werd door meer dan vier miljoen mensen bijgewoond in Rome.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Er waren zo veel aanwezigen dat niet iedereen toegang kon krijgen tot de begrafenis op het Sint-Pietersplein.
mt: There were so many people that not everyone could gain access to the funeral on St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Op verschillende plekken in Rome waren grote televisieschermen geplaatst zodat mensen de ceremonie konden zien.
mt: Large television screens were placed in various locations in Rome so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Soortgelijke opstellingen werden in veel andere Italiaanse steden en in de rest van de wereld gemaakt, en dan vooral in Polen. Hier keek een groot aantal mensen naar.
mt: Similar arrangements were made in many other Italian cities and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland. Here a large number of people looked at.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historici hebben kritiek geuit op eerdere beleidsregels van de FBI, omdat ze hun middelen focusten op gemakkelijk op te lossen zaken, voornamelijk zaken met gestolen auto's, om op deze manier de succesratio van het bureau op te krikken.
mt: Historians have criticized earlier FBI policies because they focused their resources on easy-to-solve cases, mostly stolen car cases, to boost the bureau's success ratio.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Vanaf boekjaar 2005 financierde het Congres het initiatief tegen obsceniteit en verklaarde dat de FBI tien agenten moet inzetten op volwassenenpornografie.
mt: 2005, Congress funded the initiative against obscenity and declared that the FBI must deploy ten agents on adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa behaalde de hoogste score van de inning met 70 runs met slechts 41 ballen, door 11 vieren en 2 zessen te slaan.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the innings with 70 runs off 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: In de middelste orde presteerden de slagmannen Sachin Tendulkar en Rahul Dravid goed en maakten samen honderd runs.
mt: In the middle order, the batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid performed well and made a hundred runs together.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Maar nadat India de wicket van de captain verloor, scoorden ze nog maar 36 runs waarbij ze 7 wickets verloren om de innings te beëindigen.
mt: But after India lost the wicket of the captain, they scored only 36 runs, losing 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: President van de Verenigde Staten George W. Bush arriveerde op 16 november in de ochtend in Singapore voor een rondreis van een week door Azië.
mt: 16 November 2006, President of the United States George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning for a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Hij werd ontvangen door Wong Kan Seng, de vicepremier van Singapore, en besprak problemen op het gebied van handel en terrorisme met de Minister-president van Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was received by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Bush sprak na de verliezen in de tussentijdse verkiezingen deze week voor een publiek over toenemende handelsbetrekkingen met Azië.
mt: Bush spoke after the losses in the mid-term elections this week to a public about increasing trade relations with Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Premier Stephen Harper is akkoord gegaan om de 'Clean Air Act' van de overheid naar een commissie voor alle partijen te sturen voor herziening, voorafgaand aan de tweede lezing, na de 25 minuten durende vergadering met NDP-leider Jack Layton bij PMO op dinsdag.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" of the government to a committee for all parties to review, prior to the second reading, after the 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Tijdens de vergadering met de Minister-president vroeg Layton om veranderingen in de milieuwet van de conservatieven, waarbij hij vroeg om het 'grondig en volledig herschrijven' van de milieuwet van de conservatieve partij.
mt: During a meeting with the Prime Minister, Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law, asking for the "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative Party's environmental law.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Sinds de federale regering de financiering heeft overgenomen van het Mersey ziekenhuis in Devonport, Tasmanië, hebben de overheid en enkele federale parlementsleden deze wet bekritiseerd als stunt tijdens de beginperiode van de federale verkiezingen die in november worden gehouden.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized the bill as a stunt during the early stages of the federal elections to be held in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Minister-president John Howard heeft echter verklaard met de wet slechts te willen voorkomen dat de voorzieningen van het ziekenhuis werden teruggeschaald door de Tasmaanse overheid, door 45 miljoen Australische dollars extra uit te trekken.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard has however stated that the law was only intended to prevent the hospital's facilities from being scaled back by the Tasmanian government, by adding an extra 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Volgens het laatste bulletin wees de stand van de zeespiegel op een vloedgolf. Er is enige duidelijke tsunami-activiteit geregistreerd nabij Pago Pago en Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the sea level was rising, indicating a tsunami. There was some clear tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Er is in Tonga geen grote schade of ernstig letsel doorgegeven, hoewel de stroom voor enige tijd uitviel. Hierdoor leken de Tongaanse autoriteiten de tsunami-waarschuwing van het PTWC niet te kunnen ontvangen.
mt: There have been no reports of major damage or serious injury in Tonga, although the power was out for a time. This may have prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning from the PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: De waarschuwingen werden ingetrokken, maar toch waren veertien scholen in Hawaï aan of nabij kustlijnen woensdag de hele dag gesloten.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii were closed or near coastal areas on Wednesday all day.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: George W. Bush, de leider van de VS, juichte de bekendmaking toe.
mt: George W. Bush, the leader of the US, cheered the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Een woordvoerder van Bush, Gordon Johndroe, beschreef de belofte van Noord-Korea 'een grote vooruitgang in ons doel om het Koreaanse schiereiland te denucleariseren.'
mt: A Bush spokesman, Gordon Johndroe, described the North Korean pledge as "a big step forward in our goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: De tiende storm van het Atlantische orkaanseizoen die een naam kreeg, subtropische storm Jerry, vormde zich vandaag boven de Atlantische Oceaan.
mt: 10th storm of the Atlantic hurricane season to be named, subtropical storm Jerry, formed today over the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Volgens de NHC (National Hurricane Center) levert Jerry momenteel geen gevaar voor het vasteland op.
mt: According to the NHC (National Hurricane Center) Jerry is not currently a threat to the mainland.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Volgens berekeningen van het U.S. Corps of Engineers kan 6 inches regen mogelijk de eerder beschadigde dijken doen doorbreken.
mt: 6 inches of rain could possibly break the earlier damaged levees, according to calculations by the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: In de Ninth Ward stond het water tijdens de orkaan Katrina op meer dan 20 voet hoogte. Nog steeds staat het water hier tot aan de middel, omdat de nabije dijk het water niet kon tegenhouden.
mt: In the Ninth Ward, the water during Hurricane Katrina was over 20 feet high.  Still, the water is up to the middle, because the nearby levee could not hold it back.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Het water stroomt over een stuk van 100 voet breed over de dijk.
mt: 100 feet of the levee is under water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: De Commons-beheerder Adam Cuerden uitte vorige maand tijdens zijn gesprek met Wikinews zijn frustraties over de verwijdering.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletion in an interview with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: 'Hij [Wales] loog in principe al tegen ons vanaf het begin. Allereerst door te doen alsof het om juridische redenen ging. Ten tweede door net te doen alsof hij naar ons luisterde, tot hij de kunst verwijderde.'
mt: 'He [Wales] lied to us in principle from the beginning. First by pretending it was a legal matter. Second by pretending to listen to us until he removed the art.'
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: De ergernissen binnen de gemeenschap resulteerde in de huidige pogingen om een beleid op te stellen met betrekking tot seksuele inhoud van de site die miljoenen stukken media-inhoud met een open licentie host.
mt: The frustrations within the community resulted in the current efforts to establish a policy regarding the sexual content of the site that hosts millions of pieces of media content with an open license.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Het voltooide werk was voornamelijk theoretisch van aard, maar het programma is geschreven voor de simulatie van waarnemingen van het Sagittarius Galaxy.
mt: The completed work was primarily theoretical in nature, but the program is written for the simulation of observations of the Sagittarius Galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Het team was op zoek naar het effect dat zou worden veroorzaakt door de getijdenkrachten tussen de donkere materie van het heelal en die van de melkweg.
mt: The team was looking for the effect that would be caused by the tides between the dark matter of the universe and that of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Vergelijkbaar met hoe de maan kracht uitoefent op de aarde, wat leidt tot getijden, oefent de Melkweg kracht uit op het sterrenstelsel Sagittarius.
mt: Similar to how the moon exerts force on the Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way exerts force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: De onderzoekers concludeerden dat donkere materie andere donkere materie op dezelfde manier beïnvloedt als gewone materie.
mt: The researchers concluded that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Volgens deze theorie bevindt het grootste deel van de donkere materie in een sterrenstelsel zich rondom, in een soort kring, en bestaat het uit een grote hoeveelheid kleinere deeltjes.
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter in a galaxy is in a ring around it, and is made up of a large number of smaller particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Op televisiebeelden zie je witte rook van de plant af komen.
mt: On television footage you can see white smoke coming from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Lokale autoriteiten geven de volgende waarschuwing: inwoners die in de buurt van de fabriek wonen, moeten binnen blijven, airconditioners uitschakelen en geen kraanwater drinken.
mt: Local authorities give the following warning: residents living near the factory should stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Het Japanse agentschap voor kernenergie meldt dat er bij de fabriek radioactief cesium en jodium is waargenomen
mt: The Japanese nuclear agency reports radioactive cesium and iodine was detected at the plant
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: De autoriteiten vermoeden dat dit erop duidt dat er op de plek containers met uraniumbrandstof mogelijk gescheurd zijn en lekken.
mt: Authorities suspect that this may indicate that containers with uranium fuel may have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: XDR-TB (Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis) werd door Dr. Tony Moll ontdekt in de provincie KwaZulu-Natal van Zuid-Afrika.
mt: XDR-TB (Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis) was discovered by Dr. Tony Moll in the province of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Hij verklaarde in een interview dat de nieuwe variant 'heel erg verontrustend en zorgwekkend is vanwege het erg hoge sterftecijfer'.
mt: He said in an interview that the new variant is'very alarming and worrying because of the very high death rate'.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dokter Moll denkt dat sommige patiënten de ziekte hebben opgelopen in het ziekenhuis, waaronder ook twee zorgmedewerkers uit het ziekenhuis.
mt: Dr. Moll thinks some patients may have contracted the disease at the hospital, including two hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
